comments.author: naterkane
comments.message: I made a similar mistake years ago with an apple device (time capsule), where they replaced the unit, without my knowledge or permission, so i lost all of the data on the internal drive. they could not locate my original unit, and claimed that since they elected to replace my device, i no longer had rights to the old one, or my data. I remember Jeffrey Zeldman having a harddrive / data loss issue a few years ago as well.

comments.author: Ipman
comments.message: Same shit happened to me. I sent my display cracked iphone 6 to apple and expect a screen replacement. And apple sent me a refurbished iphone 6 and charged me maximum service fee. I am so pissed, because I don't even have a choice. Does the complaint work out?

replies.author: Aaron Gustafson
replies.message: That sucks. In answer to your question: Other than being cathartic? No. Sadly.
